short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tool for syncing TranZact data into your Tally Software

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TranZact - Tally Integration Chrome Extension can be used by enterprise customers of TranZact to sync their data into their accounting software Tally. TranZact is used by Small and Medium industries (SME's) in India to manage their transactions and internal operations such as sales, purchase, production and inventory. Various documents such as Purchase Orders, Sales Orders, Quotations, Invoices can be created on TranZact. For accounting purposes, this data has to be exported to accounting software used by TranZact's clients. Tally is the most popular accounting software used by SME's in India. This Chrome Extension can be used to send TranZact's data to Tally in a seamless manner. Following vouchers can be created in Tally via this extesion-
- Purchase Vouchers
- Sales Vouchers
- Payment Vouchers
- Receipt Vouchers
- Journal Entries
- Stock Journal
